Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

1)     A woman should perform 20 Rakats Taraweeh at home. The intention should be to perform compulsory Taraweeh Salah.

 

2)     We are unable to locate the meaning of the name.

 

3)     Be tolerant and humble in front of your mother. She will love you over a period of time.

 

4)     Life is full of challenges. The adversities experienced by your brother are not necessarily due to some one having done something on him. Your brother should face the challenges of life and with that perform five daily Salah, recite Quran daily and make Dua. Never lose courage. Allah will always change the adverse conditions to favorable conditions. Insha Allah.

 

5)       Try your level best to get as close as possible to Allah in Ramadhan.

 

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
